snippet: The order will allow more clinics offering safe and legal abortion to continue operating pending a final court resolution.
abstract: Editorial contends unsigned Supreme Court order preventing Texas from enforcing two parts of state's extreme new abortion restrictions is significant victory for women in state; points out order will allow more clinics offering safe and legal abortion to continue operating pending a final court resolution.
lead_paragraph: The order will allow more clinics offering safe and legal abortion to continue operating pending a final court resolution.

headline.main: The Supreme Court Acts for Texas Women
headline.print_headline: The Supreme Court Acts for Texas Women
